actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: Resolution directing the Secretary of Defense to provide to the House of Representatives all information in possession of the Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff which formed the basis of certain comments by that Chairman at Duke University on or about October 10, 1974.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Defense to provide to the House of Representatives all information in possession of the Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff which formed the basis of comments by the Chairman at Duke University on October 10, 1974, pertaining to Jews owning the banks and newspapers in this country.

titles.title: Resolution directing the Secretary of Defense to provide to the House of Representatives all information in possession of the Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff which formed the basis of certain comments by that Chairman at Duke University on or about October 10, 1974.
